kpi.name: M5000C357

kpi_info.title: CQI CORRELATED FOR MIMO DUAL STREAM CLASS18
kpi_info.use: Distribution of the correlated values of CQI1 and CQI2 of the two MIMO data streams. The sum of the two CQI values and there difference are correlated into specific classes. UPDATED: The counter is updated by 1 due to the following class criteria: class18: sum(CQI1+CQI2)=0 or 7

kpi.kpi_alias: CQI CORRELATED FOR MIMO DUAL STREAM CLASS18
